title:
When will Mega Millions (lottery) make its North Carolina debut? There was an article in the Star News on November 2 but I haven\'t seen or heard anything else about Mega Millions coming to N.C. since then.



Ref: http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091102/ARTICLES/911029953?Title=North-Carolina-adding-Mega-Millions-to-lottery-offerings
text:
Ticket sales for Mega Millions are set to go on sale in N.C. on
Sunday, 1/31. More details expected today.
